title: Ariana Grande appears to be engaged after posting a telling Instagram post
description: Ariana Grande is now off the market, according to her Instagram account.

title: After legal threat, Fox airs news package debunking election fraud claims made by its own hosts
description: If President Trump tunes into Fox News this weekend, he may see something unexpected: a point-by-point fact-check to wild election fraud claims made by some of his favorite hosts on the network.

title: Trump's actions show he's still only out for himself
Mexicans making medical supplies for US fear Covid risk
description: Already working under poor labor conditions, employees at Mexican factories manufacturing US-bound medical supplies say the coronavirus pandemic has made things even worse. CNN's Matt Rivers reports.

title: How the pandemic stole Christmas but Santa Claus got it back
description: Every Christmas season for the last 16 years, Tom Carmody has dressed as Santa Claus and "ho, ho, ho-ed" his way into the hearts of countless children at malls and schools across the country.

title: Man's late father leaves him $10 to buy first beer
description: Before dying from esophageal cancer, John Goodman left his son Matt a $10 bill to buy his first beer, a secret his mom and sister kept from him for six years. On December 6, the Taunton, Massachusetts, resident used the money to have his first legal drink.

title: The many U-turns of Boris Johnson
description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson surprised the United Kingdom this weekend by announcing tough new coronavirus restrictions in some areas just days after saying such measures would be "inhuman." But at the close of an unpredictable and unprecedented year, the British leader's U-turn on holiday season travel and gatherings was just one more in a series of rosy predictions and failed promises. Here's a short review:

title: Manchester United fires six goals past Leeds to continue impressive Premier League run
description: Manchester United continued its imperious run of form in the Premier League with a 6-2 demolition of Leeds United.

title: Woman wakes up with a raccoon in her Christmas tree
description: Chaos ensues as Florida resident Aubrey Iacobelli tries to coax the raccoon out of her Christmas tree. Then her dog and the raccoon get into a scuffle.

title: Nevada man charged with murder in slaying of Native American woman on reservation
description: A man is accused of killing a Native America woman on the Pyramid Lake Paiute Tribes' Reservation, the US Attorney's Office in Nevada said Friday.

title: Stelter: Radicalization is infesting airwaves of pro-Trump media
description: CNN's Brian Stelter explains how the country faces radicalization as some right-wing media outlets flood the airwaves with conspiracy theories and disinformation.

title: Rupert Murdoch gets vaccine as Fox News pushes misinformation
description: CNN's Brian Stelter and Oliver Darcy discuss Fox News' continued promotion of misinformation surrounding Covid-19 vaccinations, despite Rupert Murdoch himself receiving a dose earlier this week.

title: Fareed: Trump does not view the truth as a constraint
description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria describes President Trump's "propaganda strategy" online and says it closely resembles Russia's methods.

title: Paul McCartney shows off his musical skills in a new album recorded during quarantine
description: Paul McCartney has officially released an album that he recorded during his time in quarantine.

title: Pythons might become a new menu item in Florida if scientists can confirm they're safe to eat
description: The predator might soon become the prey if Florida scientists can confirm that Burmese pythons -- an extremely invasive species in the Everglades -- are safe for us to eat.

title: Experts know more about the coronavirus vaccines than any other in history, surgeon general says
Lockdowns have stopped people moving. And fugitives are running out of hiding places
description: As Covid-19 restrictions tightened in China early this year, a fugitive who had been on the run for four years after allegedly stealing a corpse was running out of places to hide.

title: 'SNL' introduces its new Joe Biden
description: Just hours after Jim Carrey said he would no longer play president-elect Joe Biden on "Saturday Night Live," the NBC variety show introduced its new Biden.

title: A customer at an Ohio restaurant left a $5,600 tip to split among the entire staff for Christmas
description: Employees at a restaurant in Ohio received a Christmas gift they didn't see coming when a customer left a $5,600 tip for the entire staff to split.

title: Chilean president handed $3,500 fine for mask-less selfie with stranger on beach
description: Chilean President Sebastian Pinera was slapped with a $3,500 fine on Friday after posing for a selfie on the beach with a bystander without wearing a mask as required during the coronavirus pandemic, health authorities said.

title: A pedophilia website operator has been arrested in the kidnapping of a 12-year-old California girl
description: A Virginia man authorities describe as a "White supremacist" and "an advocate for pedophilia" is facing charges in California and Colorado for traveling across the country to kidnap a 12-year-old girl.

title: How to cope with grief during the holidays and a pandemic
description: The overwhelming amount of loss we've experienced during this pandemic is in stark contrast to what is supposedly the happiest time of the year.

title: Congress on brink of deal on $900 billion relief package after resolving key dispute
description: A deal on a long-awaited rescue package to deliver much-needed aid to struggling Americans suddenly was within reach after a major breakthrough Saturday night over a key sticking point: the role of the Federal Reserve to intervene in the US economy.

title: Ursid meteor shower peaks this week around winter solstice
description: Keep your eyes on the early morning skies for the oft-neglected Ursid meteor shower on December 22, on the heels of the winter solstice.

title: Europe's coronavirus crisis is resurging. For months, 3 Nordic nations kept it under control — without lockdowns
description: • Christmas canceled for millions of Britons due to new strain of Covid-19

title: Sydney to enforce pre-Christmas restrictions as mystery Covid-19 cluster grows
Pentagon under pressure from Trump administration to split NSA and Cyber Command
description: The Trump administration is pushing to make major adjustments to the Pentagon organizations charged with cybersecurity and signals intelligence, according to a US defense official.

title: John Bolton reacts to Flynn's pitch for martial law: 'Appalling'
description: Former national security adviser John Bolton weighs in on news of a heated Oval Office meeting involving aides to President Trump, lawyer Sidney Powell and her client, former national security adviser Michael Flynn. The gathering reportedly devolved into screaming matches over Powell and Flynn's suggestions about overturning the election.

title: FDA authorizes a second Covid-19 vaccine as US reports highest number of daily cases
description: A second Covid-19 vaccine will soon be shipped out across the country -- a "remarkable scientific achievement," according to one expert, that brings the country one step closer to the end of a brutal pandemic.

title: Former Mississippi Gov. William Winter dies at 97
description: Former Mississippi Governor William Winter, "who championed education initiatives, job creation, and racial harmony throughout his life," died Friday at age 97, his family said.

title: Minnesota state senator dies after being diagnosed with Covid-19
description: Minnesota state Sen. Jerry Relph died Friday following his diagnosis and hospitalization from Covid-19.

title: Boris Johnson backtracks on Christmas rules after Covid-19 strain proves to spread faster
India crowns new Miss Transqueen
description: India has a new Miss Transqueen -- and she's headed for the world stage, determined to speak out for the country's marginalized transgender community.
